thread.title: Betrayal is at the heart of the Fate of the Furious trailer
thread.title_full: Betrayal is at the heart of the Fate of the Furious Super Bowl trailer - The Verge

author: Andrew Liptak
title: Betrayal is at the heart of the Fate of the Furious trailer
text:
A new trailer for the next installment of the Fast and the Furious franchise, Fate of the Furious just arrived. 
The film is the first following the death of one of its main stars, Paul Walker. This teaser highlights Dom (Vin Diesel) betraying the group and going rogue, while Deckard Shaw (Jason Stathem) has to work with the rest of the crew. As expected, thereâ€™s plenty of fast cars and over the top crashes. 
Fate of the Furious will hit theaters on April 14th, 2017.
